d: Simone is simon, adapted for breasts.

bustAlignedButtons.d: Optional button spacing strategies to ensure a button at the bustline

bustAlignedButtons.even.d: Button spacing is calculated for buttons above the bustline, and this spacing is used for all buttons.

bustAlignedButtons.split.d: Different button spacings are calculated and used for buttons above and below the bustline.

bustAlignedButtons.disabled.d: Different button spacings are calculated and used for buttons above and below the bustline.

bustDartAngle.d: Controls the angle by which the (side) bust dart slopes downward

bustDartLength.d: Controls how close the bust dart approaches the bust point

contour.d: Controls how sharply the extra room for breasts is removed again below the chest

frontDarts.d: Whether to include front darts or not

frontDartLength.d: Controls how close the front dart approaches the bust point
